mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board_Reply_tb (rno, bno, reply, replyer) VALUES (SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: UPDATE Board_Reply_tb SET reply = #{reply}, updatedate = SYSDATE WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Board_Reply_tb WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY rno asc
